name: Monsters and Wizards
description:
Monsters and Wizards is a fighting game made for the Jame Gam game jam. It is about fighting wizards who turned you into a monster. I am sorry if the web build does not work for you, Godot 4.0, the engine I used to build this game, does not have a working export to web. If anyone knows how to export for web, please tell me!

Controls:

A and D for left and right movement

Space for jump

Left and Right arrows for dash attack

Mouse for Menu navigation
